messages.subject: RE: [nihontostudy] question

messages.messageBody:
Thanks guys !

great stuff Mark et Rich

-----Oorspronkelijk bericht-----
Van: Richard Turner [mailto:ikkanshi@...]
Verzonden: dinsdag 26 augustus 2003 0:46

Onderwerp: Re: [nihontostudy] question

http://www.geocities.com/Tokyo/Pagoda/8187/Script.htm

Rich
----- Original Message -----
From: Matthew E. Hoyle
To: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Tuesday, August 26, 2003 3:51 AM
Subject: [nihontostudy] question




Friends,

Does anyone here know what the old Japanese measurments are in modern
cm
or inches ?

Shaku, bu, sun, rin (hope I got that right.)

Many thanks, Matt.
